title: Strengthening Pedagogical Practice Competencies: Interdisciplinary Ethics Microlearning: Practical Applications in Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Mathematics Knowledge and General Understanding of Ethical Reasoning
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three ethical dilemmas that may occur during mathematical modeling processes
Learners can write a report analyzing bias issues in data interpretation from an interdisciplinary perspective
Learners can produce a video explaining social responsibilities as professionals in mathematics-based decision-making processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
